definition: to express/to give expression to/variant of 紓|纾[shu1]/to relieve
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: One day is hardly enough to show our gratitude.
sentences.chinese: 僅這一天遠不完全可以抒發我們對於您的感激之情。

sentences.english: How about expressing it with a little dance?
sentences.chinese: 來跳段舞抒發下心情如何？

sentences.english: It expresses its masters emotions by describing the scenery and narrating the stories.
sentences.chinese: 採用比興寫景述事，以抒發感情。

sentences.english: Expose the deepest pain imaginable by singing about your mother's death?
sentences.chinese: 唱一首關於母親之死的歌，抒發心底最深的痛？

sentences.english: I wish to catch every note from you to express our mutual feelings.
sentences.chinese: 我願銜住你的每個音符，與你抒發共同的感情。
抒發自己的情感就叫發情。

sentences.english: You get to act out all the feelings and emotions that you shouldn't have.
sentences.chinese: 你要把你所有的不應當有的感覺和情感都抒發出來。

sentences.english: You never hide your feelings, and express everything that's inside.
sentences.chinese: 你永不會把想說的話藏在心，總會抒發自己的感情。

sentences.english: Even deliberately seeking a touch of sadness, to express the feelings of loneliness sad.
sentences.chinese: 甚至刻意追求一種淡淡的哀愁，抒發孤獨傷感的情懷。

sentences.english: When dancing, be free to express yourself but try not to bump into other people.
sentences.chinese: 跳舞的時候要盡情地抒發的感情，不過不要去撞別人。

sentences.english: In the past, we expressed our thoughts and ideas in our dairy.
sentences.chinese: 過去，我們藉助日記抒發感情，表達觀點。

sentences.english: They can feel that they are getting expressed.
sentences.chinese: 他們能夠感覺到，他們得以抒發自己的見解。

sentences.english: Ink is Yang, expressive with rich saturation;
sentences.chinese: 墨是陽性的，抒發而飽和的。

sentences.english: I am past writing angst songs for kids .
sentences.chinese: 我已經不再給少男少女寫抒發焦慮的歌。

sentences.english: Or the pursuit of The Sound of Music of the expression of heart and desire.
sentences.chinese: 還是執着的追求內心對真善美的抒發和渴望。

sentences.english: I see the anguished poetry scribbled on the wall bystoned teenagers.
sentences.chinese: 我看見牆上滾石少年的抒發痛苦的詩歌。

definition: to entrust (to sb)/to place (one's hope, energy etc) in/a thing in which you invest (your hope, energy etc)
to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
to recount/to tell of/to relate/(fig.) (of a thing) to stand as testament to (some past history)
to touch/to stir up (trouble or emotions)/to move (sb's emotions or worry)
to sublimate/sublimation (physics)/to raise to a higher level/to refine/promotion
immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
